Fuel taken on at New Delhi for the
7,520-mi. New Delhi-Tokyo segment
brought the final aircraft weight at the
gate to 645,200 1b. The second segment
was the shortest of the three, and aircraft
speed was reduced to 536.329 mph. The
segment was completed in 14 hr. 21 min.,
gate-to-gate time, after the aircraft had
been placed in a holding pattern for ap-
proximately 20 min. Total fuel burned
was 281,800 lb. Cruising altitude during
the second segment ranged from 35,000
ft. to 45,000 ft.
Landing at Tokyo occurred at 0329
GMT and arrival at the gate was at 0334
GMT.
Fuel remaining on the aircraft after
arrival was 31,600 1b., or 4,952 gal.
After the 3-hr. 53-min. transit time in
Tokyo, the Liberty Bell departed at 0725
GMT for the final 7,621 mi. to New
York.
